results.name: Vida: Chronicles of a former hero in another world
Finding my way to the Final Boss
Ultimate Tater-nauts 2: Parasitic Boogaloo - MSU Project

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-2350M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7470M
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Storage: 430 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 10240.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo at 2.2 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 2.2Ghz
  • Storage: 430 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Screen Resolution is recommended.
